creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pounded indigo; loose front band of scrolled applique and embroidered strips; black, white, red, green, yellow; back: collar handstitched to body; same applique pattern with embroidery and stitched bordered bands; three bands of same applique patterns on sleeves separated by embroidery and stitched multicolored stripes; black lining; side vents
title: Jacket
